item.title: Smashing Your SANS Course
item.description: If you’re reading this post, you likely know of the SANS course and associated GIAC certification. You’re likely about to sit your course and/or exam and are looking for some tips and tricks to maximise the amount of value you get out of this eye-wateringly expensive course. This post is an overview of the tips and tricks that I have for smashing your SANS GIAC experience that I didn’t really read in other places.
